definition: toward the posterior end of the body, situated in or directed toward the part of the body from which the tail arises
details:
adverb
- toward the posterior end of the body
= synonyms: caudally
adjective
- situated in or directed toward the part of the body from which the tail arises
= example: situated in or directed toward the part of the body from which the tail arises
- resembling a tail
= synonyms: taillike
- constituting or relating to a tail
= example: constituting or relating to a tail
